release_notes:
• Add holdings sort, toggle return type, remove profile stats
• Simplify portfolio performance calculation and fix UI consistency
• Make sharing options private by default, keep visibility public
• Fix import paths for AccountsScreen and RealEstateScreen
• Fix auto-update release notes to show all changes since last version
• Remove profile menu dropdown, navigate directly to profile screen
• Fix performance calculation for users who started investing during the year
• Fix TransactionType import prefix in data_provider.dart
• Improve CI reliability: add Gradle caching, retries, and timeouts
• Prioritize Alibaba Maven mirrors to avoid rate limiting
